definition: any of various card games based on whist for four players, to make a bridge across something
details:
noun
- any of various card games based on whist for four players
- a structure that allows people or vehicles to cross an obstacle such as a river or canal or railway etc.
= synonyms: span
- an upper deck where a ship is steered and the captain stands
= synonyms: bridge deck
- the link between two lenses
= synonyms: nosepiece
- a denture anchored to teeth on either side of missing teeth
= synonyms: bridgework
- a wooden support that holds the strings up
- a circuit consisting of two branches (4 arms arranged in a diamond configuration) across which a meter is connected
= synonyms: bridge circuit
- the hard ridge that forms the upper part of the nose
= example: the hard ridge that forms the upper part of the nose
- something resembling a bridge in form or function
= example: something resembling a bridge in form or function
verb
- to make a bridge across something
= example: to make a bridge across something
- to cross over on a bridge
= example: to cross over on a bridge
- to connect or reduce the distance between
= example: to connect or reduce the distance between
= synonyms: bridge over
